With any of these uncracked Mashine Expansion torrents you can use ONLY the samples. The groups, kits, instruments, Multi FX, etc (anything that isn't an audio file) require activation and can't be used unless you have a cracked version of Maschine 1.7.2. The latest Maschine version is 1.8.1 and I have not seen a crack for it yet.
